summary: This document is an email forwarding a New York Times article titled 'Why the Jeffrey Epstein Investigation Is Not Over' to Geoffrey Berman, the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York, from an audit subject. The email was sent on August 11, 2019, shortly after Epstein's death, indicating ongoing interest in the investigation's continuation.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Recipient of an email forwarding a New York Times article about the ongoing Epstein investigation, indicating he is a key legal official overseeing the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the investigation referenced in the forwarded New York Times article; his death by suicide is implied as the reason the investigation continues.

events.title: Email Forwarding NYT Article on Epstein Investigation
events.description: An email is sent to U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman forwarding a New York Times article discussing why the Jeffrey Epstein investigation is not over, likely in reference to his recent death.

keyFacts: An email was sent to U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman on August 11, 2019, regarding the ongoing Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The email forwards a New York Times article titled 'Why the Jeffrey Epstein Investigation Is Not Over'.
The timing suggests the email was sent shortly after Epstein's death, highlighting continued scrutiny of the case.
